document_data.mainbody:
lassian Trank Eldwing was a dragonborn of Tymanther and a member of Clan Tlassian in 1479 DR.
Trank had a jagged scar across the top of his head from a wound that he took in the service of his clan.
Trank was considered an impulsive individual.
Some years before 1479 DR, Trank was severely wounded while on duty. As a reward for his services, he was given his own shop in the Market Floor of Djerad Thymar. He sold both mundane and magical arms and armor, and his works were considered masterpieces by the people of Djerad Thymar.
